casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Billy Lee APPLE. No. 195P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 26, 2007. Heather Freeman, Assistant Attorney General, James R. Woodall, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of April 2007 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of April 2007."
